alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 11:48AM EDT until June 12 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... East central Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1230 PM EDT. * At 1148 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Tallahassee, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Ralford Greenway, Apalachee Regional Park, Cody, Chaires Crossroads, Baum, Capps, Nash, Thomas City, Capitola, St. Marks Headwaters Greenway, Chaires, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Lloyd and Wacissa Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
